pkgmetadata.longdescription: Downloader-python---**What can it do?**___>You can use it to download images,text and vedios in the internet.--->Download moudles for your Python.--->Write python script and run it.---**Can we make mods for 'downloader-python'?*****>Yes,we can.--->You can read the file:moudle path/downloader-python/TEXT FOR MOD MAKER/README.TXT,make mods and upload to PyPI---About Author---**Author's e-mail*****>email:guoxiuchen20170402@163.com
